subject: Deaths (Fatalities)
Football
College Athletics
lead_paragraph: The family of Bennie Abram, a former Mississippi player, filed a wrongful-death lawsuit against the university, Coach Houston Nutt and the N.C.A.A. in Hinds County Circuit Court.
snippet: The family of Bennie Abram, a former Mississippi player, filed a wrongful-death lawsuit against the university, Coach Houston Nutt and the N.C.A.A. in Hinds County Circuit Court.
